meanings.definition: Superlative form of growth, meaning experiencing the most growth.
meanings.sent1: The plant in the garden is the growthiest one, as it has grown taller than all the others.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the trees in the forest, the oak tree is the growthiest, reaching the highest into the sky.
meanings.sent3: The growthiest pumpkin at the fair won a prize for being so big and impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her ambition was like the growthiest flower in the garden, always reaching for the sun.
meanings.sent5: The growthiest wave crashed against the shore, showing its immense power.

meanings.definition: Comparative form of growth, meaning experiencing more growth than something else.
meanings.sent1: This year's harvest was growthiest compared to last year, with more fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The growthiest vine in the garden climbed higher than the others, reaching the top of the trellis.
meanings.sent3: The growthiest puppy in the litter was always the first to learn new tricks.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like the growthiest branches on a tree, spreading out and reaching far.
meanings.sent5: The growthiest cloud in the sky cast a shadow over the entire field, signaling an approaching storm.
